meta.description: http://www.ihealthtube.com  Ginger Taylor is Executive Director of the Canary Party, a movement that advocates for victims of medical injury. She discusses the many conflicts of interest when it comes to the HPV vaccine, which is now recommended for both girls AND boys. She talks about the dangers of the vaccine and why many are reporting them, but not getting any support.

title: This Controversial Vaccine Could Make Your Child Sick... or Worse!
cleaned_text:
http://www.ihealthtube.com

 Ginger Taylor is Executive Director of the Canary Party, a movement that advocates for victims of medical injury. She discusses the many conflicts of interest when it comes to the HPV vaccine, which is now recommended for both girls AND boys. She talks about the dangers of the vaccine and why many are reporting them, but not getting any support.
